name: On The Road Again (Lanthanum)
description:
On the Roas Again is a car chase game. You have to chase a bad guy in orange car in minimum time. Be careful to vehicles in the road, the bad guy is crazy driving !

Joystick control

Keyboard control

  • QD/AD - Moving left/right on th road
  • Left arrow/Right arrow - Moving left/right on th road
  • Esc - Start/Pause
  • Spacebar - Brake
  • F4 - Restart level

Credits

  • Do Not Run, music by Trevor Lentz - Licence CC BY-SA 3.0
  • Sound effects realized with SFXR and got on freesound.org
    • Police siren by guitarguy1985 - Licence CC0 1.0
    • Police siren car by vlammenos - Licence CC0 1.0

This game was created for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 139
